text:
Okie so can someone please tell Me how I can upload a pfp to Twitter without it looking fucked up?
Twitter won't let Me upload one from My phone for whatever reason.. app is updated and everything I have no idea why. So I upload one from My computer but the last 2 been looking fucked up... I've used My computer before tho and they looked fine idk how to fix it ğŸ™ƒ
